200059.name: ui_ready_to_call_it_a_day
200059.english: Ready to call it a day?

200125.chinesesimplified: 此鱼重量超出当前鱼护限制
200125.english: This fish is too heavy for your keepnet

200144.name: ui_travel_expenses
200144.chinesesimplified: 即将前往{0}，您需要支付旅行费用
200144.english: You're heading to {0}. Travel cost required.

200494.name: ui_tap_the_screen_to_continue
200494.chinesesimplified: 点击屏幕任意位置继续

200502.name: ui_ready_to_call_it_a_day_still_got_room
200502.chinesesimplified: 确认结束旅程吗？鱼护还剩余{0}空间
200502.english: End trip? {0} space left in your keepnet

200515.name: ui_do_you_want_to_repair_all_components_in_for?
200515.chinesesimplified: 是否要以{0}价格维修{1}内的所有配件？
200515.english: Do you want to repair all parts in {1} for {0}?

200516.name: ui_do_you_want_to_sell_the_contents_of_for?
200516.chinesesimplified: 是否要以{0}价格出售{1}内容？
200516.english: Do you want to sell the contents of {1} for {0}?

200517.chinesesimplified: 是否卸下当前背包内的所有物品？
200517.english: Do you want to unequip all items in your current backpack?

200518.name: ui_your_rod_setup_has_changed_do_you_want_to_save_this_setup?
200518.chinesesimplified: 原有钓组配置已经变更，是否保存当前搭配？
200518.english: Your rig has been changed. Do you want to save this setup?

200519.name: ui_do_you_want_to_unequip_all_items_in_your_current_backpack?
200519.chinesesimplified: 是否卸下背包内的所有物品？
200519.english: Do you want to unequip all items in your current backpack?

200535.name: ui_no_modification_is_required
200535.english: No Changes Made, No Need to Save

200544.name: ui_log_out_game
200544.english: Do you want to log out of the game?

200545.name: ui_low_on_food
200545.chinesesimplified: 你未携带适量的食物，是否继续去钓鱼？
200545.english: You haven't brought enough food. Do you still want to go fishing?

200570.name: ui_dismantle
200570.english: Do you want to disassemble the current rig?

200571.name: ui_damaged
200571.english: Rod holder is damaged. Cannot switch rods.

200572.name: ui_pick_one
200572.chinesesimplified: 当前没有携带钓组，还是去挑选一套吧
200572.english: You haven't brought any rig. Why not pick one first?

200573.name: ui_missing_essential_parts
200573.chinesesimplified: 当前所有竿具都配件不齐，无法进行钓鱼，还是去挑选一套吧
200573.english: None of your rod setups are complete. Please pick a usable one.

200574.name: ui_damaged_rod
200574.chinesesimplified: 当前{0}钓组破损，无法调用{0}
200574.english: The current {0} rig is damaged and cannot be used.

200575.name: ui_still_fishing
200575.chinesesimplified: 当前{0}钓组中的配件或者饵不齐，是否继续去钓鱼？
200575.english: The {0} rig is missing some accessories or lures. Do you still want to go fishing?

200576.name: ui_low_durability
200576.chinesesimplified: 当前{0}钓组耐久度较低，容易破损，是否继续去钓鱼？
200576.english: The durability of the {0} rig is low and it may break easily. Do you still want to go fishing?

200577.name: ui_need_food
200577.chinesesimplified: 你未携带适量的食物，是否继续去钓鱼?
200577.english: You haven't brought enough food. Do you still want to go fishing?

200581.name: ui_leaderboard_reward_desc_1
200581.chinesesimplified: 钓鱼重量排行（永久)奖励描述

200582.name: ui_leaderboard_reward_desc_2
200582.chinesesimplified: 钓鱼重量排行（每月)奖励描述

200593.name: ui_ranking_info
200593.chinesesimplified:
榜单要求：
渔场掘金——钓起世界中价值最高的鱼
大鱼征服者——钓起世界中重量最大的鱼
榜单说明：
周榜：每周一北京时间8点更新
月榜：每月一号北京时间8点更新
总榜：记载了历史记录上的所有强者
200593.english:
Leaderboard Requirements:
Fishery Rush: Catch the most valuable fish in the world.
Big Fish Hunter: Catch the heaviest fish in the world.

Leaderboard Explanation:
Weekly Leaderboard: Updates every Monday at 0:00 UTC.
Monthly Leaderboard: Updates on the 1st of each month at 0:00 UTC.
All-Time Leaderboard: Records all top players in history

200618.name: ui_Occurred_Try_Later
200618.chinesesimplified: 目前系统异常，请稍后重试
200618.english: System error occurred. Please try again later

200623.name: ui_login_to_keep_rewards
200623.english: Login daily to keep rewards coming

200640.name: ui_bait_damaged_rod
200640.english: 【{0}】The fishing rig is damaged and cannot be baited

200641.name: ui_novice_sign
200641.chinesesimplified: 请在照片上签署你的名字
200641.english: Please sign your name on the photo

200655.name: tips_top_up
200655.chinesesimplified: 根据国家新闻出版署发布的《关于进一步严格管理 切实防止未成年人沉迷网络游戏的通知》，本游戏已设置实名认证系统和防沉迷系统，并接入国家实名认证系统和防沉迷系统。游戏中部分玩法和道具需要付费，规范向未成年人提供付费服务：未满8周岁的用户不能充值；满8周岁未满16周岁的用户，单次充值金额不得超过50元人民币，每月充值金额累计不得超过200元人民币；满16周岁未满18周岁的用户，单次充值金额不得超过100元人民币，每月充值金额累计不得超过400元人民币。
200655.english: According to the Notice on Further Strictly Managing and Effectively Preventing Minors from Being Addicted to Online Games issued by the National Press and Publication Administration, this game has set up a real name authentication system and an anti addiction system, and is connected to the national real name authentication system and anti addiction system. Some gameplay and props in the game require payment, and it is regulated to provide paid services to minors: users under the age of 8 cannot recharge; Users who are over 8 years old but under 16 years old are not allowed to recharge more than 50 RMB in a single transaction, and the cumulative monthly recharge amount is not allowed to exceed 200 RMB; Users who are over 16 years old but under 18 years old are not allowed to recharge more than 100 RMB in a single transaction, and the cumulative monthly recharge amount is not allowed to exceed 400 RMB.

200670.name: ui_fish_recommend_tips_01
200670.chinesesimplified: 等级不够，无法购买鱼饵
200670.english: You don’t have a high enough level to purchase bait.

200671.name: ui_fish_recommend_tips_02
200671.chinesesimplified: 背包已满，已放进仓库中
200671.english: Your backpack is full, and items have been moved to the warehouse.

200694.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_01
200694.chinesesimplified: 身体侧扁，呈流线型，体色通常为银灰色，背部颜色较深，腹部颜色较浅，腹侧有明显锯齿缘。
200694.english: The body is laterally compressed and streamlined, usually silvery gray in color, with the back being darker and the abdomen lighter. There is a distinct serrated edge on the ventral side.

200695.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_02
200695.chinesesimplified: 体呈长椭圆形，侧扁，腹部圆。头小，上下颌约等长。体色通常为银灰色，背部颜色较深，腹部较浅。
200695.english: It has a long elliptical body, which is laterally compressed with a rounded abdomen. The head is small, and the upper and lower jaws are approximately equal in length. The body color is usually silvery gray, with the back being darker in color and the abdomen lighter.

200696.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_03
200696.chinesesimplified: 鱼体蓝绿色，腹部有黑色、白色至黄色的散点，背鳍的软棘突部有一个暗点。
200696.english: The fish has a blue-green body, with scattered black, white to yellow spots on the abdomen, and a dark spot on the soft spine part of the dorsal fin.

200697.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_04
200697.chinesesimplified: 太阳鱼体质强健，头小背高，背部拱圆，腹部平直，侧面观类似椭圆状；鳃盖骨边缘突出，长有一蓝黑色的形似耳状的软膜；背部及边缘橄榄色至蓝绿色，体侧有暗纹；体下部蓝绿色；头部边缘有彩虹蓝和绿斑。
200697.english: Sunfish are robust in constitution, with a small head and a high back that is arched, while the abdomen is flat, presenting an elliptical shape when viewed from the side. The edge of the operculum protrudes, bearing a blue-black, ear-shaped soft membrane. The back and its edges range from olive to blue-green, with dark stripes on the sides of the body. The lower part of the body is blue-green, and the edges of the head are marked with iridescent blue and green spots.

200698.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_05
200698.chinesesimplified: 颜色偏蓝绿，头胸部至腹部呈淡橙红色或淡橙黄色，背部淡青灰色，鳃盖后缘有一深蓝色或黑色的耳状软膜。
200698.english: The color tends to be blue-green. The area from the head and chest to the abdomen is pale orange-red or pale orange-yellow, while the back is light bluish-gray. There is a dark blue or black ear-shaped soft membrane on the posterior edge of the gill cover.

200699.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_06
200699.chinesesimplified: 体型较小，身体呈椭圆形，色彩鲜艳，通常具有蓝色、绿色、橙色等斑纹。
200699.english: It is small in size, with an elliptical body and bright colors, usually featuring patterns in blue, green, orange and other hues.

200700.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_07
200700.chinesesimplified: 身体呈长椭圆形，侧扁，头部较小，口下位，呈马蹄形。体色通常为银白色或灰白色，背部颜色较深，腹部较浅。
200700.english: The body is long and elliptical, flat-sided, with a small head. The mouth is subterminal and horseshoe-shaped. The body color is usually silvery white or grayish white, with the back being darker and the abdomen lighter.

200701.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_08
200701.chinesesimplified: 水牛鱼名字的由来是因为它后背弓起，和美洲水牛很像。体型较大，身体呈椭圆形，侧扁。头部较大，唇厚且有褶皱。
200701.english: The name "buffalo fish" comes from the fact that its back is arched, resembling that of the American bison. It is relatively large in size, with an elliptical and laterally compressed body. It has a large head, thick lips with folds.

200702.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_09
200702.chinesesimplified: 身体呈长椭圆形，侧扁，头部较大，口大，呈弧形。体色通常为橄榄色或棕色，背部颜色较深，腹部较浅，体侧有黑色斑点或条纹。
200702.english: The body is long and elliptical, laterally compressed, with a relatively large head and a large,arcuate mouth. The body color is usually olive or brown, with the back being darker and the abdomen lighter. There are black spots or stripes on the sides of the body.

200703.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_10
200703.chinesesimplified: 体略高，侧扁，呈椭圆形。口小，端位，口角处有一对短须。体色多样，有绿、黄、蓝、白等色，体表光滑无鳞，黏液丰富。
200703.english: The body is slightly tall, flat-sided, and elliptical in shape. It has a small, terminal mouth, with a pair of short barbels at the corners of the mouth. The body color is diverse, including green, yellow, blue, white, etc. The body surface is smooth without scales and is rich in mucus.

200704.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_11
200704.chinesesimplified: 斑点叉尾鮰性格温顺，有群集的习性，在天然水体主要栖息于湖泊和河流深水的底层水中。体型较长，前部较宽，后部稍细长。头部较小，吻稍尖，口亚下位，横裂。体表光滑无鳞，侧线完全，体侧有不规则的黑色斑点。
200704.english: The channel catfish has a gentle temperament and is gregarious. In natural waters, it mainly inhabits the deep bottom layers of lakes and rivers. Its body is relatively long, with the front part being wider and the rear part slightly slender. It has a small head, a slightly pointed snout, and a subterminal, horizontally split mouth. The body surface is smooth without scales, the lateral line is complete, and there are irregular black spots on the sides of the body.

200705.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_12
200705.chinesesimplified: 体侧扁，腹部有棱鳞。体色背部呈青灰色，腹部银白色。
200705.english: The body is flat-sided, with scutes on the abdomen. The back is bluish-gray in color, while the abdomen is silvery white.

200706.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_13
200706.chinesesimplified: 身体呈椭圆形，侧扁，体色通常为橄榄色或棕色，带有黑色或棕色的斑点和条纹，腹部颜色较浅。
200706.english: The body is elliptical and flat-sided, usually olive or brown in color, with black or brown spots and stripes, and the abdomen is lighter in color.

200707.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_14
200707.chinesesimplified: 性凶猛，会猎食同类，在缺少捕猎对象的情况下，会比其他鱼更耐饿，甚至可以一年不吃东西。身体呈长椭圆形，稍侧扁，头部较大。背部颜色较深，腹部较浅，体侧有黑色斑点，尾鳍宽大，呈圆形。
200707.english: It is ferocious in nature and preys on its own kind. When there is a lack of prey, it is more resistant to hunger than other fish, and can even go without food for a year. The body is long and elliptical, slightly laterally compressed, with a relatively large head. The back is darker in color, the abdomen is lighter, there are black spots on the sides of the body, and the caudal fin is broad and rounded.

200708.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_15
200708.chinesesimplified: 体型较小，身体呈椭圆形，侧扁。体色鲜艳，背部呈橄榄色或棕色，腹部黄色，体侧有黑色或棕色的条纹和斑点。
200708.english: It is small in size, with an elliptical and  flat-sided body. It has bright colors: the back is olive or brown, the abdomen is yellow, and the sides of the body are covered with black or brown stripes and spots.

200709.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_16
200709.chinesesimplified: 身体细长，呈流线型，头部扁平。体色通常为橄榄色或棕色，背部颜色较深，腹部较浅，体侧有黑色斑点，各鳍呈红色或橙色。
200709.english: The body is slender and streamlined, with a flat head. The body color is usually olive or brown, with the back being darker and the abdomen lighter. There are black spots on the sides of the body, and all fins are red or orange.

200710.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_17
200710.chinesesimplified: 身体呈椭圆形，侧扁，体色通常为绿色或棕色，带有黑色或棕色的斑点和条纹，腹部颜色较浅。
200710.english: The body is elliptical and flat-sided, usually green or brown in color, with black or brown spots and stripes, and the abdomen is lighter in color.

200711.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_18
200711.chinesesimplified: 身体呈纺锤形，侧扁，背肉稍厚，嘴巴大，下颌稍突出。体色通常为青灰色或橄榄色，腹部银白色，体侧有黑色或棕色的斑点和条纹。
200711.english: The body is spindle-shaped and flat-sided, with slightly thickened dorsal flesh. It has a large mouth, and the lower jaw protrudes slightly. The body color is usually cyan-gray or olive, with a silvery white abdomen, and there are black or brown spots and stripes on the sides of the body.

200712.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_19
200712.chinesesimplified: 身体细长，呈蛇形，体表光滑无鳞，有丰富的黏液。体色通常为橄榄色或棕色，腹部颜色较浅，背鳍、臀鳍和尾鳍相连。
200712.english: The body is slender and snake-like, with a smooth, scaleless surface and abundant mucus. Its body color is usually olive or brown, with a lighter-colored abdomen. The dorsal fin, anal fin, and caudal fin are connected.

200713.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_20
200713.chinesesimplified: 身体呈长椭圆形，稍侧扁，头部较小。体色通常为浅灰色或棕色，带有黑色或棕色的斑点和条纹，腹部颜色较浅，鳞片细小，侧线完全。
200713.english: The body is long and elliptical, slightly flat-sided, with a small head. The body color is usually light gray or brown, with black or brown spots and stripes, and the abdomen is lighter in color. It has small scales and a complete lateral line.

200741.name: ui_bag_fix_tips
200741.english: Durability is full and cannot be repaired

200753.name: ui_fishing_shop_tips_02
200753.chinesesimplified: 当前钓场内没有钓场商店
200753.english: There are no fishing shop in this fishing pond

200754.name: ui_fishing_shop_tips_03
200754.chinesesimplified: 该商品已下架，请重新进入功能查看
200754.english: This product has been taken down, please re-enter the function to check

200785.name: ui_fishing_commission_tips_07
200785.english: Do you want to spend <color=#ffec09>{0} × {1} </color>to refresh the commission?

200786.name: ui_fishing_commission_tips_08
200786.chinesesimplified: 当前钓场内没有钓鱼委托
200786.english: There are no fishing commission in this fishing pond

200788.name: ui_fishing_commission_tips_10
200788.english: No further reminders on the same day

200791.name: ui_fishing_commission_rule
200791.chinesesimplified:
1.奖励次数和委托将于每天北京时间8点刷新。
2.每天可完成{0}次委托，次数在所有钓场内功通用。
3.提交鱼之后，将根据鱼的价格，获得一定比例的金币奖励。不同的委托有不同的比例，星级越高的委托难度越高，同时奖励也越高!
200791.english:
1. The number of rewards and commissions will be refreshed every day at 0:00 UTC.
2. You can complete {0} commissions per day, which are applicable to all fishing ponds.
3. After submitting the fish, you will receive a certain percentage of gold coins based on the fish's price. Different assignments have varying percentages, with higher-star assignments being more challenging but also offering greater rewards!

200793.name: ui_fishing_commission_tips_14
200793.english: The selection quantity has reached the upper limit

200803.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_21
200803.chinesesimplified: 黑斑刺盖太阳鱼有一个深的和侧面压缩的身体。头部小，背部呈弓形；有一个相当大的嘴，上颚延伸到眼睛下面；背鳍和臀鳍很大，形状几乎相同。在银灰色到白色的体色上有黑色的斑点。在繁殖季节，它的颜色可能主要是黑色，带有一些彩虹色的蓝色和绿色斑点。背鳍、肛门鳍和尾鳍标有成排的黑斑。黑斑刺盖太阳鱼喜欢清澈和静止的水，似乎更喜欢有丰富的水生植物覆盖的地区。
200803.english: The Black Crappie has a deep and laterally compressed body. Its head is small with an arched back, and it possesses a fairly large mouth where the upper jaw extends below the eyes. The dorsal and anal fins are large and almost identical in shape. Its body coloration ranges from silvery-gray to white with black speckles. During the breeding season, its color may turn predominantly black with some iridescent blue and green spots. The dorsal, anal, and tail fins are marked with rows of black spots. Black Crappie prefer clear and still waters and seem to favor areas with abundant aquatic vegetation.

200804.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_22
200804.chinesesimplified: 本鱼体呈纺锤形且且侧扁，嘴小，上翘，鼻子尖，侧线弯曲，体背部呈深绿色或橄榄色，腹部呈银白色，较小个体的侧面是银色，较大个体的侧面是金色，侧面可能有淡淡的暗色条纹。喜欢安静的水域，成群活动，因此可以在湖泊、池塘、泥沼和沟渠中找到，有时出现在河流最安静的地方，喜欢杂草丛生的地方，属杂食性，以藻类、昆虫、浮游生物等为食，可做为食用鱼、养殖鱼、饵鱼及观赏鱼。
200804.english: This fish has a spindle-shaped and laterally compressed body, a small upturned mouth, a pointed snout, and a curved lateral line. The back is dark green or olive, while the belly is silvery-white. Smaller individuals have silvery sides, while larger ones exhibit golden sides with faint dark stripes. They prefer quiet waters and move in schools, so they can be found in lakes, ponds, marshes, and ditches, sometimes inhabiting the calmest parts of rivers. They thrive in weedy areas, are omnivorous, feeding on algae, insects, plankton, etc., and are used as food fish, farmed fish, baitfish, and ornamental fish.

200805.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_23
200805.chinesesimplified: 体侧上半部为黄褐色，下半部为金黄色，体侧有许多发光的小颗粒。 因为其出水能叫，夜间发光，头中有像棋子的石头，所以叫石首鱼。喜欢栖息在湖泊、溪流，属肉食性，以甲壳类、软体动物、鱼类、端脚类等为食，可做为食用鱼及游钓鱼。
200805.english: The upper half of its body is yellowish-brown, while the lower half is golden yellow, with many small glowing particles on its sides. It is called the "drum" because it can make sounds when out of water, glows at night, and has a stone-like structure in its head resembling a chess piece. It prefers inhabiting lakes and streams, is carnivorous, feeding on crustaceans, mollusks, fish, amphipods, etc., and is used as a food and game fish.

200806.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_24
200806.chinesesimplified: 黑鮰鱼体形又粗又长，腹腔膨出，尾呈侧扁，背鳍短，骨质硬刺外缘光洁，头及体测具不规则的灰紫色斑块。栖息在静止的湖泊、沟渠、池塘，夜行性，属肉食性，以昆虫、蠕虫、甲壳类等为食，可作为养殖鱼、游钓鱼及食用鱼。
200806.english: The Black Bullhead has a thick and long body, a bulging abdomen, and a laterally compressed tail. Its dorsal fin is short with a smooth-edged bony spine. The head and body exhibit irregular gray-purple patches. It inhabits still lakes, ditches, and ponds, is nocturnal, carnivorous, feeding on insects, worms, crustaceans, etc., and is used as a farmed fish, game fish, and food fish.

200807.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_25
200807.chinesesimplified: 体延长，稍侧扁；背部略隆起，腹部较平直；头大；吻尖钝，口大，斜裂；尾鳍截形。背部蓝灰色，腹侧黄绿色，体侧有许多镶金边的黑斑，尾鳍基部有一个镶金边的眼斑。幼鱼期体侧有3条黑色横带，由末条横带向尾柄处拖出1条纵带。栖息在岩石底质的深水域，成群活动，属肉食性，以昆虫、鱼类为食，可作为食用鱼、观赏鱼及养殖鱼。
200807.english: The body is elongated and slightly laterally compressed, with a slightly raised back and a straight abdomen. The head is large, the snout is blunt, and the mouth is large and slanted. The tail fin is truncate. The back is blue-gray, the ventral side is yellow-green, and the body has many black spots edged in gold. The base of the tail fin has a gold-edged eyespot. Juvenile fish have three black horizontal bands on their sides, with a vertical band extending from the last band to the caudal peduncle. They inhabit deep waters with rocky substrates, move in schools, are carnivorous, feeding on insects and fish, and are used as food fish, ornamental fish, and farmed fish.

200808.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_26
200808.chinesesimplified: 白刺盖太阳鱼的头部多呈现银灰或银白色，整体体色偏白，身体上装饰着黑色的条纹。栖息在沙泥底质的池塘、湖泊、河流，属肉食性，可作为游钓鱼。
200808.english: The head of the White Crappie is mostly silvery-gray or silvery-white, with an overall whitish body adorned with black stripes. It inhabits ponds, lakes, and rivers with sandy or muddy substrates, is carnivorous, and is used as a game fish.

200809.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_27
200809.chinesesimplified: 其体呈梭形、肥厚，口端位、口间距不大，上、下颌有颚齿和犬齿，鳃部长有锐利的小刺，背鳍较长，尾鳍为分叉的端尾形，腹鳍位于腹部两侧、稍后于胸鳍；体色为淡黄色，腹部呈黄白色或淡灰色，身体两侧有浅黑色斑纹。栖息在沙石底质的溪流、湖泊、水塘，属肉食性，以端脚类、桡脚类、水生昆虫为食，繁殖期在3月至6月，可做为游钓鱼。
200809.english: Its body is spindle-shaped and stout, with a terminal mouth and a moderate mouth gape. The upper and lower jaws have jaw teeth and canine teeth. The gill cover has sharp small spines. The dorsal fin is long, and the tail fin is forked. The pelvic fins are located on both sides of the abdomen, slightly behind the pectoral fins. The body color is light yellow, with a yellowish-white or light gray belly and light black stripes on both sides. It inhabits streams, lakes, and ponds with sandy or rocky substrates, is carnivorous, feeding on amphipods, copepods, and aquatic insects. Its breeding season is from March to June, and it is used as a game fish.

200810.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_28
200810.chinesesimplified: 体型较长，前部较宽肥，后部较细长，头部较长。口亚端位，头部上下颚具深灰色触须4对，长短各异，以口角须最长，鼻须最短、眼较小，侧中位，鳃孔较大，鳃膜不连颊部。通体呈乳白色或淡粉红色，眼睛为红色，触须同样为白色或半透明。
200810.english: The body is elongated, wider and thicker at the front and thinner and longer at the back, with a long head. The mouth is subterminal, with four pairs of dark gray barbels of varying lengths on the upper and lower jaws, the longest being at the corners of the mouth and the shortest being the nasal barbels. The eyes are small and mid-lateral, the gill openings are large, and the gill membranes are not connected to the cheeks. The entire body is milky white or light pink, with red eyes and similarly white or translucent barbels.

200811.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_29
200811.chinesesimplified: 本鱼体粗壮，成纺锤形，吻圆钝，体色为古铜色，背部青铜色，腹部为白色，体被圆鳞，尾鳍叉型，侧线明显。底栖性鱼类，主要栖息在水质清澈，平静的溪流及湖泊，以吸盘似的吻部吸取底泥，以泥中底栖性无脊椎动物、藻类及有机碎屑为食。繁殖期在春季，雌鱼在泛滥的河川、沼泽或湖泊产卵。
200811.english: This fish has a stout, spindle-shaped body with a blunt snout. Its body color is bronze, with a bronze back and a white belly. It has cycloid scales, a forked tail fin, and a distinct lateral line. It is a benthic fish, mainly inhabiting clear, calm streams and lakes, using its sucker-like snout to feed on bottom sediment, consuming benthic invertebrates, algae, and organic debris. Its breeding season is in spring, and females lay eggs in flooded rivers, marshes, or lakes.

200812.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_30
200812.chinesesimplified: 该物种具有鸭嘴状扁平大口和下颚突出的典型形态特征，体表呈现独特的纵向条纹状斑纹，作为淡水生态系统中的顶级掠食者，以鱼类、甲壳类及两栖动物为食。因其凶猛的捕食习性和高度耐寒性，既是重要的食用经济鱼类，也是北美地区著名的游钓鱼种。
200812.english: This species has typical morphological features, including a duckbill-like flattened large mouth and a protruding lower jaw. Its body exhibits unique longitudinal striped patterns. As an apex predator in freshwater ecosystems, it feeds on fish, crustaceans, and amphibians. Due to its fierce predatory habits and high cold tolerance, it is both an important food fish and a famous game fish in North America.

200813.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_31
200813.chinesesimplified: 小口黑鲈是通常为褐色，眼睛红色，侧面为深褐色色垂直条纹。背鳍有13至15日根软条。小口黑鲈的上颌延伸到眼睛中间。生活在深色河水里的小口黑鲈的形状为鱼雷形，颜色为深褐色，喂养更有效率。然而，生活在湖畔的小口黑鲈形状为椭圆形，颜色往往是浅黄色，适应其所在的沙子环境，利于隐蔽。
200813.english: The Smallmouth Bass is usually brown with red eyes and dark brown vertical stripes on its sides. The dorsal fin has 13 to 15 soft rays. The upper jaw of the Smallmouth Bass extends to the middle of the eye. Those living in dark rivers have a torpedo-shaped body and dark brown coloration, which improves feeding efficiency. In contrast, those living in lakes have an oval shape and tend to be light yellow, adapting to their sandy environment for better camouflage.

200814.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_32
200814.chinesesimplified: 本鱼体延长成圆柱形，鱼体花纹变化丰富，从少有花纹到密部细花纹皆有，体色为深褐色，腹部浅色，体背硬鳞，幼鱼的背脊及侧面有深色纵纹。栖息于淡水河川、湖泊或半咸水的潟湖、河口，属肉食性，以甲壳类、鱼类、昆虫等为食。
200814.english: The body is elongated and cylindrical, with varying patterns ranging from few markings to densely packed fine patterns. The body color is dark brown with a lighter belly, and the back has hard scales. Juveniles have dark longitudinal stripes on their back and sides. They inhabit freshwater rivers, lakes, or brackish lagoons and estuaries, are carnivorous, feeding on crustaceans, fish, insects, etc.

200815.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_33
200815.chinesesimplified: 云斑鮰背部为暗绿褐色，身体两侧为渐变的淡绿色或淡黄色，腹部则为白色。体表有暗褐色的斑点。云斑鮰为夜行性淡水底栖鱼类，偏好池塘、湖泊、沟渠、水流缓慢的溪流等缺氧或泥泞的水体，但仍能适应清澈的河流。云斑鮰为贪吃的杂食动物，主要用嗅觉和触觉寻找食物。它们几乎会吃下一切所看见的东西，例如藻类、贝类、蜗牛、水蛭、昆虫、水草、鱼卵和小鱼等。此外，云斑鮰可使用其触须与同类交流。
200815.english: The back is dark greenish-brown, and the sides gradually fade to light green or light yellow, while the belly is white. The body has dark brown spots. Channel Catfish are nocturnal freshwater benthic fish, preferring oxygen-deprived or muddy waters such as ponds, lakes, ditches, and slow-moving streams but can also adapt to clear rivers. They are voracious omnivores, primarily using smell and touch to find food. They will eat almost anything they encounter, such as algae, shellfish, snails, leeches, insects, aquatic plants, fish eggs, and small fish. Additionally, Channel Catfish use their barbels to communicate with each other.

200816.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_34
200816.chinesesimplified: 本鱼体呈延长略侧扁，体色多样，从浅钢灰色到墨黑色，口下位，周边具有乳状突起，头部圆钝，背鳍镰刀状，24-35条鳍条，尾柄长，尾鳍深分叉，臀鳍鳍条7-8条枚，侧线鳞55-58枚，寿命可达13年，栖息岩石、沙底质、流动快速的溪流底层水域，以水生昆虫、甲壳类、藻类为食，繁殖期在3至6月。
200816.english: The body is elongated and slightly laterally compressed, with colors ranging from light steel gray to jet black. The mouth is inferior, surrounded by papillae-like structures. The head is rounded and blunt, the dorsal fin is sickle-shaped with 24–35 rays, the caudal peduncle is long, and the tail fin is deeply forked. The anal fin has 7–8 rays, and the lateral line has 55–58 scales. Its lifespan can reach 13 years. It inhabits the bottom waters of fast-flowing streams with rocky or sandy substrates, feeding on aquatic insects, crustaceans, and algae. The breeding season is from March to June.

200817.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_35
200817.chinesesimplified: 与其他狗鱼一样，其身体为典型的伏击捕食形状，体长，头部和背部很平。其颜色为浅灰色、棕色或绿色，侧面有暗色垂直条纹，有些可能是斑点。有些鱼甚至没有斑纹，尤其是在混浊的水中生活的鱼。和其他狗鱼一样，北美狗鱼是伏击捕食者，并且是任何所在水域的顶级掠食者。它们捕食当地生态系统的所有鱼类（包括相食同类），同时也会捕食昆虫、麝鼠、褐鼠、小鼠、蛙类和鸭类。
200817.english: Like other pikes, its body has a typical ambush predator shape—elongated with a flat head and back. Its color is light gray, brown, or green, with dark vertical stripes on the sides, some of which may be spotted. Some individuals may lack patterns, especially those living in turbid waters. Like other pikes, the Chain Pickerel is an ambush predator and an apex predator in any water body it inhabits. It preys on all fish in the local ecosystem (including cannibalism), as well as insects, muskrats, brown rats, mice, frogs, and ducks.

200818.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_36
200818.chinesesimplified: 本鱼体似斑点雀鳝，不同的是前者嘴较短，且成鱼头部腹面长窄处无板骨。体背部为深褐色，腹部花纹多变化，侧面有时具有条纹。本鱼栖息于淡水河川、湖泊或半咸水具有沙底质的水域，属肉食性，以甲壳类、鱼类、昆虫等为食，繁殖期为4-5月。可为游钓鱼或观赏鱼，卵有毒。
200818.english: This fish resembles the Spotted Gar but differs in having a shorter snout and lacking bony plates on the ventral side of the head in adults. The back is dark brown, and the belly patterns vary, sometimes with stripes on the sides. It inhabits freshwater rivers, lakes, or brackish waters with sandy substrates, is carnivorous, feeding on crustaceans, fish, insects, etc. The breeding period is from April to May. It is used as a game fish or ornamental fish, and its eggs are toxic.

200819.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_37
200819.chinesesimplified: 本鱼体侧扁，背腹外廓相对称，纺锤型。头长与体高略相等，口端位，口裂大。上下颌和犁骨皆有齿，颌齿大而锋利。眼在体轴线的下方，较大。背鳍居于体中央稍后，腹鳍起点于背鳍后方，尾鳍分叉较浅。有脂鳍。体背部呈深褐色，与背鳍、尾鳍都具有深色细圆点，体下半部为淡黄色至橙色，体中央具有一排排列整齐的深色斑块，体中线具一红色线条。
200819.english: The body is laterally compressed, with symmetrical dorsal and ventral outlines, and spindle-shaped. The head length is roughly equal to the body height. The mouth is terminal with a large gape. Both the upper and lower jaws and the vomer have teeth, with the jaw teeth being large and sharp. The eyes are located below the body axis and are relatively large. The dorsal fin is positioned slightly behind the center of the body, the pelvic fins start behind the dorsal fin, and the tail fin is shallowly forked. It has an adipose fin. The back is dark brown, with dark fine spots on the dorsal and tail fins. The lower half of the body is light yellow to orange, with a row of neatly arranged dark patches along the center and a red line along the midline.

200820.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_38
200820.chinesesimplified:
美国红鱼体呈纺锤形，侧扁，背部略微隆起，以背鳍起点处最高，头中等大小，口裂较大，齿细小，排列紧密，眼上侧位，后缘与口裂末端平齐，中等大小，分布于头两侧，侧线明显，背部呈浅黑色，鳞片有银色光泽，腹部中部白色，两侧呈粉红色，尾鳍呈黑色，尾基部侧线有1-4个黑色圆斑。
美国红鱼喜集群，游泳迅速，洄游习性明显，主食贝类、头足类、小鱼等，在人工饲养条件下也摄食人工配合饵料。
200820.english:
The Red Drum has a spindle-shaped body, laterally compressed with a slightly raised back, highest at the start of the dorsal fin. The head is medium-sized, with a large mouth and small, tightly arranged teeth. The eyes are dorsolaterally positioned, with the posterior edge aligning with the end of the mouth gape. The lateral line is distinct. The back is light black with silvery-scale luster, the central abdomen is white, the sides are pink, and the tail fin is black. The base of the tail has 1–4 black spots along the lateral line.
Red Drum prefer schooling, swim rapidly, and exhibit significant migratory habits. They primarily feed on shellfish, cephalopods, and small fish but also consume artificial feed under captive conditions.

200821.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_39
200821.chinesesimplified: 蓝鲇鱼，又名长鳍真鮰，为北美鲇科真鮰属的一种，是北美洲数量最多的一种鲇鱼。它主要分布在密苏里、俄亥俄、田纳西和阿肯色的密西西比河里。这些蓝鲇鱼被大量的引进到水库和河流中，体长可达165公分，其息在水深、沙石底质的湖泊、溪流，杂食性，可做为食用鱼或观赏鱼。
200821.english: The Blue Catfish, also known as the longfin true catfish, is a species of the North American catfish family Ictaluridae and is the most numerous catfish species in North America. It is mainly distributed in the Mississippi River systems of Missouri, Ohio, Tennessee, and Arkansas. Blue Catfish have been extensively introduced into reservoirs and rivers, can grow up to 165 cm in length, inhabit deep lakes and streams with sandy or rocky substrates, are omnivorous, and are used as food fish or ornamental fish.

200822.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_40
200822.chinesesimplified:
头部宽阔扁平，下颚显著上翘呈铲状，身体侧扁，体色多为土黄至深棕色，幼鱼体表具黑色斑纹，成体斑纹逐渐变浅或消失。成鱼具有较大体型，常潜伏于朽木或石缝密布的水底。
该物种分布于北美五大湖南部至墨西哥北部水域，栖息于水流平缓的河道及近岸区域。铲鮰以伏击方式捕食，可吞食体积远超口腔的物体，曾有误食篮球致行动受阻的案例。当地渔民利用其凶猛习性，采用徒手诱捕法直接拖拽上岸。其肉质肥美且外形独特，被作为食用鱼、游钓鱼类及水族馆展示物种。
200822.english:
The head is broad and flat, with a prominently upturned shovel-like lower jaw. The body is laterally compressed, mostly earth yellow to dark brown in color. Juveniles have black patterns on their body, which fade or disappear in adults. Adults are large and often lurk near logs or rocky crevices on the bottom.
This species is distributed from the southern Great Lakes to northern Mexico, inhabiting slow-flowing rivers and nearshore areas. The Shovelnose Sturgeon ambushes prey and can swallow objects much larger than its mouth. There have been cases of individuals swallowing basketballs, hindering their movement. Local fishermen take advantage of its ferocity by using hand-fishing methods to lure and drag it ashore. Its meat is delicious, and its unique appearance makes it suitable as a food fish, game fish, and aquarium exhibit species.

200823.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_41
200823.chinesesimplified: 本鱼口盘比头窄，通常有58-67个躯干肌节，背部和侧面呈灰色，腹面为白色，尾鳍圆形，有深色斑点，栖息在沙石底质的溪流，成鱼在春季产卵，一直到盛夏水温超过摄氏10度，会用砾石筑巢，孵化后，幼鱼会埋在沙石待大约四年，以硅藻及有机碎屑为食，在夏末到秋末变态为成鱼后就不进食了。
200823.english: The oral disc is narrower than the head, typically with 58–67 trunk myomeres. The back and sides are gray, the ventral side is white, and the tail fin is rounded with dark spots. It inhabits streams with sandy or rocky substrates. Adults spawn in spring until midsummer when water temperatures exceed 10°C. They build nests with gravel, and after hatching, the larvae bury themselves in sand or gravel for about four years, feeding on diatoms and organic debris. They metamorphose into adults from late summer to late autumn and stop feeding thereafter.

200824.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_42
200824.chinesesimplified:
白斑狗鱼的鱼体延长，吻端尖，尾鳍分叉，侧线完整且连续，口大，背鳍及臀鳍位置靠近尾鳍。寿命通常在10～15年，但最长可以达到25年。
白斑狗鱼主要栖息在水流迟缓的河流和湖泊与水库中水草覆盖的浅水区，此外还有水温较冷、水质较清、岩石较多的水域。以其它鱼类、甲壳类、水蛇、水鸟、小型哺乳类等为食，并在食物短缺时有同类相食的习性。作为一种伏击捕食者，它们喜欢长时间隐藏在水底的水草间一动不动，等猎物出现后突然加速发动进攻。
200824.english:
The Northern Pike has an elongated body, a pointed snout, a forked tail fin, a complete and continuous lateral line, a large mouth, and dorsal and anal fins positioned close to the tail fin. Its lifespan is typically 10–15 years but can reach up to 25 years.
Northern Pike mainly inhabit slow-moving rivers, shallow weedy areas of lakes and reservoirs, as well as colder, clearer, rocky waters. They feed on other fish, crustaceans, water snakes, waterbirds, small mammals, etc., and exhibit cannibalism when food is scarce. As ambush predators, they often remain motionless among bottom vegetation for long periods, suddenly accelerating to attack when prey appears.

200825.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_43
200825.chinesesimplified:
美洲条纹狼鲈是鲈形目鮨科狼鲈属的鱼类，又称条纹石鲈、海狼鲈。体修长流线型，头小尾叉，体侧具7条窄长黑色纵纹。原产于美国东部沿岸，从墨西哥湾延伸至路易斯安那州沿海。
该鱼属广盐广温性洄游鱼类，栖息于淡水至海水环境，繁殖期溯河产卵，适温范围4-33℃，耐盐度1-35。肉食性，成鱼以鱼虾为食，性情凶猛。
200825.english:
The Striped Bass, also known as the striper or sea wolf bass, is a species of the family Moronidae, order Perciformes. It has a slender, streamlined body, a small head, a forked tail, and seven narrow long black longitudinal stripes on its sides. It is native to the eastern coast of the United States, ranging from the Gulf of Mexico to the coastal waters of Louisiana.
This fish is euryhaline and eurythermic, inhabiting environments from freshwater to seawater. It migrates upstream to spawn during the breeding season, with a suitable temperature range of 4–33°C and salinity tolerance of 1–35 ppt. It is carnivorous, with adults feeding on fish and shrimp. It is fierce and aggressive.

200829.name: ui_wiki_fish_desc_44
200829.chinesesimplified: 本鱼体细长，体上部是棕色到暗青铜色，较大的鱼颜色最深，侧面是银色，背鳍起于腹鳍之后，颚部不可伸展，且有前颚系带。鼻子又长又尖，口端位且大，一直延伸到眼睛的前面。栖息在沙石底质的中大型河流及湖泊，属杂食性，以藻类、昆虫等为食，通常清晨及傍晚活动力较强，繁殖期在春季，会进行洄游，雌鱼会在沙石浅滩上产卵，雌鱼的繁殖能力很强，可产超过20,000个卵，幼鱼孵化后，会在植被生长茂密的溪流边缘，随着成长游进较深水域。
200829.english: This fish has an elongated body, with the upper part ranging from brown to dark bronze, with larger individuals being the darkest in color. The sides are silvery, and the dorsal fin originates posterior to the pelvic fin. The jaws are non-protrusible and possess a premaxillary frenum. The snout is long and pointed, with a large terminal mouth that extends to the anterior edge of the eye. It inhabits medium to large rivers and lakes with sandy or rocky substrates. As an omnivorous species, it feeds on algae, insects, and other organisms. It is generally more active during early morning and evening hours. The spawning season occurs in spring, during which the fish migrates. Females deposit their eggs on shallow sandy or rocky shoals. They are highly prolific, capable of producing over 20,000 eggs. After hatching, the juveniles remain along the edges of streams with dense vegetation and move into deeper waters as they grow.

200881.english: The length of the string must not exceed {0} characters.

200893.name: ui_system_feedback_rule_tip_content_1
200893.chinesesimplified:
百科



百科是一个收集与查询系统，记录了游戏中所有可钓获的鱼类信息。每一条鱼都包含其图像、名称、简介、出没水域及出现条件。当玩家首次钓到某种鱼时，对应的图鉴条目会被点亮。收集进度会以百分比形式展示，完成特定图鉴集合或全图鉴收集能获得丰厚奖励。
200893.english:
WIKI



The WIKI is a collection and reference system that records information about all fish species that can be caught in the game. Each fish entry includes its image, name, description, habitat, and appearance conditions. When players catch a specific type of fish for the first time, the corresponding entry in the index will be unlocked. The collection progress is displayed as a percentage, and completing specific fish collections or the entire index will grant generous rewards.

200894.name: ui_system_feedback_rule_tip_content_2
200894.chinesesimplified:
钓鱼委托



钓鱼委托是为钓鱼玩法提供的目标性任务系统。NPC会定期发布随机或固定的钓鱼任务，要求玩家在规定时间内钓上指定的鱼种或达到特定要求（如总重量、稀有度）。完成任务后，玩家可返回发布者处交付并领取奖励，包括经验值、金币或稀有道具。
200894.english:
Fishing Commission



Fishing commission is a targeted mission system designed for the fishing gameplay. NPCs periodically issue random or fixed fishing tasks, requiring players to catch specific types of fish or meet certain criteria (such as total weight or rarity) within a set time limit. Upon completion, players can return to the questgiver to deliver the task and claim rewards, which may include experience points, gold coins, or rare items.

200895.name: ui_system_feedback_rule_tip_content_3
200895.chinesesimplified:
商城



可以使用金币购买到各种道具，并且可以直接将钓到的普通鱼、钓具、鱼饵出售，换取通用金币，用于购买游戏内各种基础道具。
200895.english:
Store



You can use gold coins to purchase various items, and you can directly sell common fish, fishing gear, and bait in exchange for universal gold coins, which can be used to buy various basic items in the game.

200896.name: ui_system_feedback_rule_tip_content_4
200896.chinesesimplified:
钓场商店



需在特定NPC处，使用上交稀有鱼或完成任务获得的专属货币进行兑换。
200896.english:
Fishing Shop



You need to exchange items at specific NPCs using exclusive currency obtained by handing in rare fish or completing tasks.

200897.name: ui_system_feedback_rule_tip_content_5
200897.chinesesimplified:
竿架



更换钓具界面是玩家管理和装备渔具的操作面板。在此界面中，所有已拥有的鱼竿、鱼线、浮漂等钓具会以图表形式清晰展示。玩家通过简单的点击或拖拽即可完成装备切换。
200897.english:
Rod Rack



The Rod Rack is an operational panel where players manage and equip their fishing gear. In this interface, all owned fishing equipment such as rods, fishing lines, and floats are clearly displayed in an icon-based layout. Players can easily switch between equipped items with simple clicks or drag-and-drop actions.

200902.name: ui_fishing_tackle_shop_content_1
200902.chinesesimplified: 购买了这套礼包你将拥有
200902.english: By purchasing this gift pack, you will receive

200931.name: ui_advisoryboard_4
200931.english: No players have been listed yet.

200934.name: ui_advisorystory_date_rule
200934.chinesesimplified:
结算时间规则:
每周一北京时间8点更新
200934.english:
The settlement time rules :
Updates every Monday at 0:00 UTC.

200936.name: ui_modechoose_2
200936.chinesesimplified: 别担心，这只会影响你初始所用的钓具，之后你依然可以体验所有的钓法。
200936.english: Don't worry, this only affects your starting gear. You'll still be able to experience all fishing styles later on.

200937.name: ui_modechoose_3
200937.chinesesimplified:
1.就像遛狗，你得不停地收线、摆动鱼竿，让你的拟饵“游”起来，装成活的。
2.主要钓那些脾气爆、有攻击性的鱼，它们看到会动的东西就想冲上去咬一口。
3.很主动，像在打猎，需要不停操作，全身都能活动开。
200937.english:
1. You constantly reel and move your rod to make the fake bait "swim" and look alive.
2. You're targeting aggressive predator fish that attack anything that moves.
3. It's active and energetic, like you're hunting the fish.

200938.name: ui_modechoose_4
200938.chinesesimplified:
1.把鱼钩挂上真鱼饵，水面上放个浮漂。你就盯着浮漂，它猛地往下沉或抖动，就是有鱼在吃了。
2.特别适合钓那些在水底或中层慢慢吃东西的鱼。
3.很悠闲，考验你的耐心，适合放松心情，享受宁静。
200938.english:
1. You put real bait on the hook and use a float/bobber on the surface. when it dips or moves, it means a fish is biting.
2. It works for the calm ones that feed near the bottom or in the middle of the water.
3. It's relaxed and peaceful. It tests your patience and is perfect for chilling out.

200957.name: ui_fishcard_15
200957.chinesesimplified: 尚未拥有卡包，通过钓鱼来获取更多
200957.english: You don‘t have any packs yet. Go fishing to earn more!
